exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Multifunction interactive communications system with circularly/elliptically polarized signal transmission and reception.

document-id.name: FLETCHER JAMES C ADMINISTRATOR, et al

exch:abstract.exch:p: A communications system that uses electromagnetic waves. The communications system . preferably operates in the millimeter-wave frequencies, and provides relatively high signal restoration and isolation. The communications system can use polarization dive

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Transgenic plants modifier for reducede cadmium transport, derivative products, and related methods

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention is directed in part to plants modified to impede the transport of Cadmium (Cd) from the root system to aerial portions of the plants by reducing the expression and/or activity levels of HMA-related transporters. Reduced expression of NtHMA transporters in the plants results in substantially reduced content of Cadmium (Cd) in the leaf lamina. Various consumable products that are substantially free or substantially reduced in Cd content can be produced by incorporating leaves derived from tobacco plants modified to reduce the expression and/or activity of NtHMA transporters. Methods for producing the modified plants are also disclosed.
